amendment.description: Amendment established a pilot program to make grants to minority institutions that partner with nonprofit organizations that have experience developing relationships between industry, minority institutions, and other entities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 110-603 to establish a pilot program to make grants to minority institutions that partner with nonprofit organizations that have experience developing relationships between industry, minority institutions, and other entities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barrow amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
